name: 100 Hidden Animanaults - Felicat & Laika
description:
Important information
  • Press "N" for night mode.
  • Press "Del" then "Esc" to reset all achievements.


100 Hidden Animalnauts Felicat & Laika is a game to search for the famous space animals.

It's a fun quest for Animalnauts among rockets and space race ship designs. It's a game with black and white drawings and illustrations.

Find the cat Felicat.


You can find up to 100 hidden Animalnauts.

Be patient!

Hold the anxiety!



Relax and travel through space to find the heroes.
